Consumers Collection

Lists all Consumers.

List all Consumers

GET - https://api.zype.com/consumers/?page=page&per_page=per_page

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
page The page number of records to return (zero indexed). Example: 0. Number
per_page The number of records to return. Example: 10. Number

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

{
  "response":
    [
      {
        "_id": "54579a634c616e0389000000",
        "_keywords": [
        "com",
        "example",
        "test123"
        ],
        "created_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:19.675Z",
        "email": "test123@example.com",
        "site_id": "53e8d7f869702d5b64010000",
        "stripe_id": "cus_54wKapCMCaqd9b",
        "subscription_count": 1,
        "updated_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:19.675Z"
      }
    ],
    "pagination":
      {
        "current": 1,
        "previous": null,
        "next": 2,
        "per_page": 1,
        "pages": 10
      }
  }

Create a Consumer

POST - https://api.zype.com/consumers/{consumer}

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
Consumer A set of key value pairs that describe the Consumer. Needs to include email. Hash

Response

201 Content-Type: application/json

 {
    "response":
    {
      "_id": "54579a634c616e0389000000",
      "_keywords": [
      "com",
      "example",
      "test123"
      ],
      "created_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:19.675Z",
      "email": "test123@example.com",
      "site_id": "53e8d7f869702d5b64010000",
      "stripe_id": "cus_54wKapCMCaqd9b1235",
      "subscription_count": 1,
      "updated_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:19.675Z"
    }
}

Consumer

Lists descriptive information about a Consumer

Retrieve a Consumer

GET - https://api.zype.com/consumer/{id}

Parameters

Parameter Function Type
id String id of the Consumer to retrieve. Example: 5389352e69702d401b000000. String

Request

Content-Type: application/json

Response

200 Content-Type: application/json

 {
    "response":
    {
      "_id": "54579a634c616e0389000000",
      "_keywords": [
      "com",
      "example",
      "test123"
      ],
      "created_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:19.675Z",
      "email": "test123@example.com",
      "site_id": "53e8d7f869702d5b64010000",
      "stripe_id": "cus_54wKapCMCaqd9b1235",
      "subscription_count": 1,
      "updated_at": "2014-11-03T15:08:19.675Z"
    }
}
